name: Megamania64: 1K Version
overview: The 2002 Minigame Competition's challenge was to make a worthy C64 game in 1K or less, this is Lubber\Padua aka Marco Wienkoop's attempt at such a game, based on the classic 2600 game that seemed so ahead of it's time. Eventually a bigger and much improved full game version would be released at Visionparty 2002.
